summary: Comprehensive Spanish translation testing for Bible Lesson Planner - All tested pages (Help, Profile, Templates) show correct Spanish translations when language is switched via the EN/ES dropdown

issues: 'Popular' badge text remains in English when in Spanish mode - should be 'Popular' (same word in Spanish) or localized
